item.title: 赫斯投资者 D.E. Shaw 将对雪佛龙交易投弃权票
item.description: 赫斯公司的 15 大股东之一 D.E. Shaw & Co. 计划对雪佛龙公司以 530 亿美元收购该石油公司的交易投弃权票，成为本周第二个站出来反对该交易的主要投资者。【原文：D.E. Shaw & Co., one of the top 15 shareholders in Hess Corp., plans to abstain from voting on the oil company’s $53 billion takeover by Chevron Corp., becoming the second major investor this week to come out against the deal.】

item.title: 跨国公司寻求保护，抵御墨西哥 "超级比索
item.description: 对于许多在墨西哥开展业务的美国公司来说，经济活动蓬勃发展的另一面是比索飙升带来的日益沉重的负担，因此需要采取积极的货币对冲策略。【原文：For many US-based companies doing business in Mexico, the flip side of the boon in activity is the growing burden of a surging peso, raising the need for aggressive currency hedging strategies.】

item.title: 智利顶级零售商计划时隔七年重返债券市场
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，智利最大的零售企业集团 Cencosud SA 雇用了银行，这是该公司七年来首次进军国际债券市场。【原文：Chile’s largest retail conglomerate Cencosud SA hired banks for its first foray into international bond markets in seven years, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 埃尔-埃里安称美联储 "加息换长线 "的转向与市场相悖
item.description: 穆罕默德-埃里安（Mohamed El-Erian）认为，美联储推迟降息以抑制通胀的做法有可能落后于形势。【原文：The Federal Reserve’s delay of interest-rate cuts in a bid to temper inflation runs the risk of falling behind the curve, according to Mohamed El-Erian.】

item.title: 贝莱德保留俄克拉荷马州 70 亿美元养老金合同后的反ESG 法暂停期
item.description: 俄克拉荷马州公务员退休系统批准延长与贝莱德公司（BlackRock Inc.【原文：The Oklahoma Public Employees Retirement System approved the extension of investment contracts with BlackRock Inc., a decision that comes after a judge paused the state’s anti-ESG law targeting the company.】

item.title: 穆罕默德-埃利安请杰米-戴蒙支持他对过于耐心的美联储的批评
item.description:
他说，"危险的 "快乐言论忽略了经济中出现的裂痕

。【原文：

‘Dangerous’ happy talk looks past the cracks showing up in the economy, he says

】

item.title: Tennet 电网交易停滞揭示德国联盟裂痕
item.description: 德国未能敲定收购电网运营商 Tennet Holding BV 部分股权的协议，这暴露了奥拉夫-肖尔茨（Olaf Scholz）领导的执政联盟内部的新裂痕。【原文：Germany’s failure to finalize a deal to buy part of grid operator Tennet Holding BV is exposing fresh rifts within Olaf Scholz’s ruling coalition.】

item.title: 肯尼亚银行反对国家提高金融服务业税收的计划
item.description: 据一个行业游说团体称，肯尼亚计划对金融交易征收增值税，这将使金融服务的总税率从目前的 15%提高到 40%，影响人们的负担能力和获得金融服务的机会。【原文：Kenya’s plan to charge value added tax on financial transactions will raise total taxation on financial services to 40% from 15% currently, impacting affordability and access, according to an industry lobby.】

item.title: 巴西石油公司 3R 同意以约 12 亿美元收购 Enauta 公司
item.description: 3R Petroleum Oleo e Gas SA 同意以全股票交易的方式收购 Enauta Participacoes SA，这是巴西石油行业更广泛整合的最新举措。【原文：3R Petroleum Oleo e Gas SA agreed to acquire Enauta Participacoes SA in an all-stock deal, the latest move in a wider consolidation of Brazil’s oil industry.】

item.title: 尼日利亚中央银行干预未能阻止奈拉下滑
item.description: 央行本周的干预未能阻止尼日利亚奈拉在周一利率决议前跌至两个月低点。【原文：Central bank intervention this week failed to stop slide in Nigeria’s naira to a two-month low ahead of a rate decision Monday.】

item.title: 炼油厂升级提高产量，伊拉克停止柴油进口交易
item.description: 在一些炼油厂升级帮助提高了本地产量之后，伊拉克停止了进口柴油的合同，使该国走上了燃料自给自足的轨道。【原文：Iraq halted contracts to import diesel after the upgrade of some refineries helped bolster local output, putting the country on track for fuel self sufficiency.】

item.title: 白银突破每盎司 30 美元，达到十多年来最高价
item.description: 白银十多年来首次突破每盎司 30 美元，在金融和工业需求强劲的情况下，白银的涨势比黄金更加强劲和迅速。【原文：Silver surpassed $30 an ounce for the first time in more than a decade in a rally that has become more forceful and fast than that in gold amid robust financial and industrial demand.】

item.title: 斯洛伐克部长表示对总理病情抱有更大希望
item.description: 斯洛伐克总理罗伯特-菲佐（Robert Fico）在一次未遂暗杀中身中数枪，两天后接受了另一次手术，一位部长周五表示，菲佐的健康状况正在出现好转迹象。【原文：Slovak Prime Minister Robert Fico’s health is showing signs of improvement following another surgery, two days after he suffered multiple gunshots in an assassination attempt, a minister said on Friday.】

item.title: 合金价格下跌导致 JSW 钢铁公司第四季度利润骤降
item.description: 印度 JSW 钢铁有限公司（JSW Steel Ltd.）公布的第四季度利润比去年同期下滑了 65%，原因是总体支出增加和合金价格下降。【原文：India’s JSW Steel Ltd. posted fourth-quarter profit that slumped 65% from a year earlier, following an increase in overall expenses and a decline in prices of the alloy, the company said.】

item.title: 天然气钻井商 Canacol 争取时间解决困扰债券投资者的主要问题
item.description: Jason Bednar 强调说。Canacol Energy Ltd. 首席财务官表示，该公司将在本月偿还债务，任何与此相反的说法都是 "完全错误的"。【原文：Jason Bednar was emphatic. Canacol Energy Ltd. would meet its debt payments this month and any suggestion to the contrary was “completely false,” the company’s chief financial officer said.】

item.title: 英国能源账单将比去年夏季减少 500 英镑
item.description: 预计进入夏季后，英国的能源账单将继续下降，平均每个家庭的能源账单将比去年同期减少约 500 英镑（632 美元）。【原文：UK energy bills are forecast to continue falling into the summer, with the average household about £500 ($632) better off than a year earlier.】

item.title: 马克龙在棘手的欧盟投票前在世界各地遭遇麻烦
item.description: 本周伊始，埃马纽埃尔-马克龙在凡尔赛宫向国际商界精英吹嘘他如何将法国变成吸引他们投资的磁铁。【原文：Emmanuel Macron started the week in his comfort zone, boasting to the international business elite at the Château de Versailles about how he has transformed France into a magnet for their investment.】

item.title: 意大利将在三年内成为欧洲最大债务国（Scope Says
item.description: Scope Ratings 指出，意大利将在短短三年内成为欧洲最大的债务国。【原文：Italy will have Europe’s biggest debt pile in just three years, according to Scope Ratings, which called for a plan to get its public finances in order.】

item.title: 印尼放宽部分货物进口清关规定
item.description: 在企业抱怨贸易限制扰乱经营后，印尼修订了一项进口规则，以释放滞留在其港口的数千个集装箱。【原文：Indonesia has revised an import rule in a bid to release thousands of containers being held up at its ports, after businesses complained that the trade restriction was disrupting operations.】

item.title: 被认定为俄罗斯间谍的男子称曾与英国军情六处情报部门合作
item.description: 一名阿富汗出生的男子拥有英国安全许可并曾在外交部工作，但在伦敦法院裁定他是俄罗斯 GRU 军事情报机构的特工后，他失去了恢复英国公民身份的机会。【原文：An Afghan-born man who held British security clearance and worked with the Foreign Office lost a bid to restore his UK citizenship after a London court ruled he was an agent of Russia’s GRU military intelligence service.】

item.title: 华尔街电子交易热潮为私人债务狂热增添新燃料
item.description: 电子交易的兴起和组合交易的日益普及给美国公司债券市场带来了一个意想不到的后果：使私人信贷更具吸引力。【原文：The rise of electronic trading and growing popularity of portfolio trading has had an unintended consequence for the US corporate bond market: making private credit even more attractive.】

item.title: 美国生物燃料市场因中国进口而动荡不安
item.description:
来自海外的废食用油激增，使美国农民与绿色燃料生产商之间的竞争日趋激烈。【原文：

A surge in used cooking oil from overseas is pitting American farmers against green-fuel producers.

】

item.title: 可可价格上涨，因担心主要种植区需要更多降雨
item.description: 可可期货在纽约上涨，原因是担心在全球持续短缺的情况下，需要更多降雨来增加西非主要种植区的土壤湿度。【原文：Cocoa futures rose in New York on concerns more rain is needed to boost soil moisture in the main growing areas of West Africa amid ongoing global shortages.】

item.title: 美国银行将为 WaFd 多户贷款组合支付 29 亿美元
item.description: 美国银行（Bank of America Corp）同意以约 29 亿美元的价格从 WaFd 公司购买商业房地产贷款组合，帮助这家地区性贷款机构降低其在这一已引起监管机构和投资者警惕的行业中的风险敞口。【原文：Bank of America Corp. agreed to buy a portfolio of commercial real estate loans from WaFd Inc. for about $2.9 billion, helping the regional lender reduce its exposure to a sector that has raised red flags for regulators and investors.】

item.title: 迪拜为建筑公司 ALEC 的首次公开募股挑选银行
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，迪拜已选定包括阿联酋 NBD 资本公司和摩根大通公司在内的银行参与建筑公司 ALEC 的首次公开募股计划。【原文：Dubai has picked banks including Emirates NBD Capital and JPMorgan Chase & Co. to work on the planned initial public offering of construction firm ALEC, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 欧洲央行称对 BBVA-Sabadell 交易持开放态度，放宽潜在路径
item.description: 欧洲中央银行支持毕尔巴鄂维斯卡亚阿根廷银行（Banco Bilbao Vizcaya Argentaria SA）和萨瓦德尔银行（Banco de Sabadell SA）之间的合作，如果交易实现，可能会使必要的审批变得更加容易。【原文：The European Central Bank is supportive of a tie-up between Banco Bilbao Vizcaya Argentaria SA and Banco de Sabadell SA, potentially making necessary approvals easier if the deal comes to fruition.】

item.title: 农场主正在培育杂交奶牛以出售肉牛
item.description:
对美国乳制品生产商来说，额外的收入来源是一个值得欢迎的推动力，这几年他们的牛奶销售形势严峻。【原文：

The additional income stream is a welcome boost for US dairy producers, who’ve had a tough couple of years selling milk.

】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事美洲
item.description: 早上好。贝莱德（BlackRock）的里德（Rieder）表示，美联储应该削减而不是加息来降低通胀，一位大宗商品资深交易员认为他找到了有史以来最好的交易。以下是交易员们正在谈论的话题。【原文：Good morning. Stocks pull back after another strong week, BlackRock’s Rieder says the Fed should cut, not hike, to bring down inflation, and a commodities veteran reckons he’s found the best trade he’s ever seen. Here’s what traders are talking about. — David Goodman】

item.title: 斯坦霍普的平托表示，英国需要采取更多措施促进伦敦的首次公开募股
item.description: 斯坦霍普资本公司（Stanhope Capital）创始人兼首席执行官丹尼尔-平托（Daniel Pinto）表示，随着全球交易和首次公开募股活动在经历了近两年的低迷后开始回暖，英国需要加大力度吸引更多公司在伦敦上市。【原文：Stanhope Capital founder and Chief Executive Officer Daniel Pinto said the UK needs to up its game to attract more company listings in London as deals and initial public offerings start to pick up around the world after almost two years of subdued activity.】

Country Garden Services Holdings Co. will be removed from the measure.】
